tags: g0v (pronounced gov zero) is a community dedicated towards promoting the ideas of open source and collaborative working. Participants come from every corner of society, and the community is free and  polycentric. They contribute to or start projects on their own will. There's no mandatory requirements. ### We come from everywhere
g0v is a community of open collaboration. We the g0v contributors are from everywhere. We are software developers, designers, activists, educators, writers, citizens and netizens of every profession.
